short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple extension that blocks the 1Password UI for specific domains. Hides the UI with CSS (1Password still runs).

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sometimes you don't want to see the 1Password UI on specific domains, especially if you're a developer using local environments.

Right click or use the extension icon, to "block this domain" or "unblock this domain".

Once you block a domain (and refresh the page), CSS will be added to hide the 1Password popup and UI... Ahhhh...
